articles.author: Connor Sephton
articles.title: 'Nine minutes of terror' as China becomes second country to land on Mars - Sky News
articles.description: The Tianwen-1 vessel has landed in an icy area known as Utopia Planitia, about 1,200 miles away from America's Perseverance rover.

articles.title: Indian-American Neera Tanden To Serve As Senior Adviser To Biden - NDTV
articles.description: The Biden administration has announced that Indian-American Neera Tanden will join the White House as a senior adviser to President Joe Biden.
articles.content:
Neera Tanden serves as president and CEO of Center for American Progress (File)

articles.title: Biden calls lifting of indoor mask rule 'great day' - News24
articles.description: President Joe Biden told Americans on Thursday that the lifting of the rule on indoor mask wearing was "a great day" in the fight against Covid-19 and that they could now "smile again."
articles.content:
• President Joe Biden told Americans on Thursday that the lifting of the rule on indoor mask wearing was "a great day" in the fight against Covid-19.

articles.title: 'Great day for America': Covid-19 vaccinated can finally go without masks - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: “If you are fully vaccinated, you no longer need to wear a mask,” Joe Biden is happy to announce, as the US aims for a return to pre-pandemic life.
articles.content: In a major step towards returning to pre-pandemic life, the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention has eased mask-wearing guidance for fully vaccinated people in America, allowing them to stop… [+8131 chars]
